dict.string: Check who is Streaming on twitch.tv and watch your favorite Stream via LiveStreamer on VLC.
Search live streams on twitch.tv (game or channel).
List current TOP live streams on twitch.tv.
if [ `which livestreamer` ]; then nohup livestreamer {query} high & elif [ `which mpv` ]; then nohup mpv {query} & fi

on alfred_script(q)
-- use Alfred 3 if exists, otherwise Alfred 2
set isAlfred3 to false try do shell script "osascript -e 'id of app \"Alfred 3\"'" set isAlfred3 to true end try
if isAlfred3 then tell application "Alfred 3" to search "twbygame " & q else tell application "Alfred 2" to search "twbygame " & q end if
end alfred_script
List current TOP streamed games on twitch.tv.
Searching and downloading game icons/covers... Please wait it takes some time (about 1 minute)...

keywords and description: ———————————————————————————————— twtop = top live streams on twitch.tv (sort by number of viewers) twgames = top streamed games on twitch.tv (sort by number of viewers) tw = search for a specific stream (game or streamer/channel)
optional: twbygame = twgames uses it to search for streamer by specific game twcover = search and download game icons/covers (do this, if you deleted your cover folder)
examples: ———————————————————————————————— ‚twtop’
‚tw warcraft‘ (searches for streams of „world of warcraft“ or „warcraft3“ as well as streams of a streamer who is called like „warcraftBoy“ or its stream title contains „warcraft“)
‚twgames‘
‚twbygame League Of Legends‚ (searches for streams of „league of legends“ only)
‚twcover‘
